mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), title = #{title}, body = #{body}, memberId = #{memberId}, boardId = #{boardId}
mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM article a inner join member m on a.memberId = m.id inner join board b on a.boardId = b.id WHERE 1=1
AND boardId = #{boardId}
AND m.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND a.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND a.`body` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT a.*, m.nickname as author, b.name as board, IFNULL(SUM(r.reactionStatus),0) AS extra__sumReactionPoint, IFNULL(count(case when r.reactionStatus=1 then 1 end),0) AS extra__goodReactionPoint, IFNULL(count(case when r.reactionStatus=-1 then 1 end),0) AS extra__badReactionPoint FROM article AS a INNER JOIN `member` AS m on a.memberId = m.id inner join board b on a.boardId = b.id left join reaction as r on a.id =r.relId and r.relDataTypeCode='article' WHERE a.id = #{id}
